item.title: Junichi Okada’s Epic Netflix Samurai Survival Drama Promises Blood, Honor and Hype
item.description: ‘Last Samurai Standing’ brings ‘Squid Game’ stakes and ‘Shogun’ vibes to a deadly, old-school battle for glory.
